snippet: Shares of the online marketplace surge after Tiger Global disclosed that it had raised its stake in the company to 8.9 percent as of late May.
abstract: Etsy shares rise roughly 8 percent following news that hedge fund Tiger Global had increased its stake in company to 8.9 percent; surge brings share price to $16.10, slightly above initial public offering level of $16.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Shares of the online marketplace surge after Tiger Global disclosed that it had raised its stake in the company to 8.9 percent as of late May.

headline.main: Etsy Shares Rise on Back of Tiger Global Stake
headline.print_headline: Etsy Shares Rise on Move by Hedge Fund
